description: 学习不同类型条件句的用法：零条件句、第一条件句、第二条件句、第三条件句

basic_rules: 零条件句：If + 一般现在时, 一般现在时 (表示客观事实)
第一条件句：If + 一般现在时, 一般将来时 (表示可能实现的条件)
第二条件句：If + 一般过去时, would + 动词原形 (表示不太可能实现的条件)
第三条件句：If + 过去完成时, would have + 过去分词 (表示与过去事实相反)
usage_cases: 零条件句：If you heat water, it boils. (如果你加热水，它就会沸腾)
第一条件句：If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home. (如果明天下雨，我就待在家里)
第二条件句：If I were you, I would study hard. (如果我是你，我会努力学习)
第三条件句：If I had studied hard, I would have passed the exam. (如果我努力学习，我就会通过考试)
common_errors: If I was you, I would study hard. (错误) → If I were you, I would study hard. (正确)
If I had studied hard, I would pass the exam. (错误) → If I had studied hard, I would have passed the exam. (正确)
If it will rain tomorrow, I will stay at home. (错误) → If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home. (正确)
usage_tips: 注意不同类型条件句的时态搭配
第三条件句表示与过去事实相反

zero_conditional: If you heat water, it boils.
If you don't water plants, they die.
If you mix red and blue, you get purple.
If you press this button, the machine starts.
If you don't eat, you get hungry.
first_conditional: If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.
If you study hard, you will pass the exam.
If he comes, I will tell him the news.
If she is free, she will help us.
If they arrive early, we will start the meeting.
second_conditional: If I were you, I would study hard.
If I had a lot of money, I would travel around the world.
If it were sunny, we would go to the beach.
If she were here, she would help us.
If they were free, they would come to the party.
third_conditional: If I had studied hard, I would have passed the exam.
If I had known, I would have told you.
If it had rained, we would have stayed at home.
If she had been here, she would have helped us.
If they had arrived early, we would have started the meeting.

templates.question: If I _____ you, I would study hard.
If I had studied hard, I _____ have passed the exam.
templates.explanation: 第三条件句用would have + 过去分词

learning_objectives: 掌握不同类型条件句的用法
能够正确使用各种时态搭配
了解条件句表示不同的假设情况

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用各种类型条件句，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握各种类型条件句，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解各种类型条件句，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对各种类型条件句不熟悉，需要重新学习
